thread.title: Over 70 Conservative MPs vulnerable to losing their seats over tax credit cuts, analysis suggests
thread.title_full: Over 70 Conservative MPs vulnerable to losing their seats over tax credit cuts, analysis suggests - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Over 70 Conservative MPs vulnerable to losing their seats over tax credit cuts, analysis suggests
text: Over 70 of Conservative MPs would be vulnerable to losing their seats in parliament to a public backlash against cuts to tax credits, new research suggests. The Government is planning to slash the payments to low-income working families, leaving 3.2m households worse off by an average of £1,300 a year from next April. But a total of 71 Tories have more families in their constituency set to lose from the cuts than was their parliamentary majority in May’s general election. Read more
